Value.label: Backlight Enable
Value.Help: This parameter defines the backlight state for touch button. The backlight led is on when wall switch power on if this parameter is set to ‘Enabled’, otherwise the backlight led is off. The default value is ‘Enabled’.

Value.label: Relay On/Off Indicate
Value.Help: This Parameter defines the relays state. The led will be turn on with pink color when the button is touched to turn on relay if this parameter is set to ‘Enabled’; otherwise the led state is not changed. The default value is ‘Enabled’.

Value.label: Relay On/Off Status Saved Enable
Root Device Mapped Setting
Value.Help: This parameter defines which endpoint is mapped to root device (Endpoint 0). The valid values are explained as follows. The default value is ‘Endpoint 1 is mapped to root device’. For example, assumes this parameter is set to ‘Endpoint 1 is mapped to root device’ (default value). Controller or other devices (such as door/window sensor, motion sensor, etc) that associated the wall switch send a command BASIC_SET = 0xFF to wall switch, the relay in endpoint 1 will be turned on; other relay status will not be changed.
